0.5.0.name: wordpress/anyfont
0.5.0.description:
AnyFont allows you to automatically set any custom TrueType or OpenType font absolutely anywhere you want on your WordPress site.

Easily embed your custom fonts directly into your web pages using the new "@font-face" CSS rule. The new and improved Font Manager now includes the option to convert fonts to all the different webfont formats with a single click(Requires free sign up at FontServ.com).

CSS3 "@font-face" support means you can now embed fonts into web pages and enable everyone to see your custom fonts without using any images, Flash or JavaScript.

Upgrade your FontServ.com account to Pro before 31 December 2011 and only pay $12 for 12 months.

Pro users will also get exclusive early access to the new features launching soon at FontServ.com!

Features:

  • WPMU/WordPress 3 compatible with full

Easily embed your custom fonts directly into your web pages using the new "@font-face" CSS rule. The new and improved Font Manager now includes the option to convert fonts to all the different webfont formats with a single click(Requires free sign up at FontServ.com).

CSS3 "@font-face" support means you can now embed fonts into web pages and enable everyone to see your custom fonts without using any images, Flash or JavaScript.

Upgrade your FontServ.com account to Pro before 31 December 2011 and only pay $12 for 12 months.

Pro users will also get exclusive early access to the new features launching soon at FontServ.com!

Features:

  • WPMU/WordPress 3 compatible with full
